info.title: FortiOS Monitor
info.description: REST API for configuring FortiOS objects and settings

user--device--query--definitions--detect.title: Detected Interface
user--device--query--definitions--detect.description: Interface name from which the device is detected.

user--device--query--definitions--detect.title: Detected Interface Telemetry
user--device--query--definitions--detect.description: True when the detected interface allows FortiTelemetry.

user--device--query--definitions--dhcp_l.title: DHCP Lease Status
user--device--query--definitions--dhcp_l.description: DHCP lease status if the IPv4 address is leased from a DHCP server.

user--device--query--definitions--dhcp_l.title: DHCP Lease Expire Time
user--device--query--definitions--dhcp_l.description: UNIX epoch time when the DHCP lease expires.

user--device--query--definitions--dhcp_l.title: DHCP Lease Reserved
user--device--query--definitions--dhcp_l.description: True when the DHCP lease is reserved.

user--device--query--definitions--dhcp_s.title: DHCP Server ID
user--device--query--definitions--dhcp_s.description: ID of the DHCP server from where the IPv4 address is leased.

user--device--query--definitions--fortia.title: FortiAP ID
user--device--query--definitions--fortia.description: ID of the FortiAP from which the device is detected.

user--device--query--definitions--fortia.title: FortiAP SSID
user--device--query--definitions--fortia.description: SSID of the FortiAP to which the device connects.

user--device--query--definitions--fortia.title: FortiAP Name
user--device--query--definitions--fortia.description: Name of the FortiAP from which the device is detected.

user--device--query--definitions--fortic.title: FortiClient Interface
user--device--query--definitions--fortic.description: The interface with which the FortiClient endpoint communicates. The field is duplicated with field 'gateway_interface_name' and will be deprecated in 7.4.

user--device--query--definitions--gatewa.title: FortiClient Gateway Interface
user--device--query--definitions--gatewa.description: The interface with which the FortiClient endpoint communicates.

anyOf.title: Tag
anyOf.description: Matched Security Posture Tag for an active/online device.

anyOf.title: Tags
anyOf.description: Matched Security Posture Tags for an active/online device.

items.title: Tag
items.description: Matched Security Posture Tag for an active/online device.

user--device--query--definitions--is_for.title: FortiSwitch Client
user--device--query--definitions--is_for.description: True when the device is behind a FortiSwitch.

user--device--query--definitions--fortis.title: FortiSwitch Name
user--device--query--definitions--fortis.description: Name of the FortiSwitch from which the device is detected.

user--device--query--definitions--fortis.title: FortiSwitch ID
user--device--query--definitions--fortis.description: ID of the FortiSwitch from which the device is detected.

user--device--query--definitions--fortis.title: FortiSwitch Serial
user--device--query--definitions--fortis.description: Serial number of the FortiSwitch from which the device is detected.

user--device--query--definitions--fortis.title: FortiSwitch Port ID
user--device--query--definitions--fortis.description: ID of the FortiSwitch port from which the device is detected.

user--device--query--definitions--fortis.title: FortiSwitch VLAN ID
user--device--query--definitions--fortis.description: ID of the FortiSwitch VLAN from which the device is detected.

user--device--query--definitions--fortis.title: FortiSwitch Port Name
user--device--query--definitions--fortis.description: Name of the FortiSwitch port from which the device is detected.

user--device--query--definitions--fortis.title: Last Seen by FortiSwitch
user--device--query--definitions--fortis.description: Seconds since the device was most recently detected by FortiSwitch.

user--device--query--definitions--is_det.title: Detected Interface Has WAN Role
user--device--query--definitions--is_det.description: True when the detected interface's role is WAN.

user--device--query--definitions--is_for.title: FortiClient Endpoint
user--device--query--definitions--is_for.description: True when the device is a FortiClient endpoint.

user--device--query--definitions--is_ems.title: Registered on EMS
user--device--query--definitions--is_ems.description: True when the FortiClient endpoint is registered on EMS.

user--device--query--definitions--is_mas.title: Primary Device
user--device--query--definitions--is_mas.description: True when the device is a primary device.

user--device--query--definitions--is_onl.title: Online
user--device--query--definitions--is_onl.description: True when the device is online.

user--device--query--definitions--last_s.title: Last Seen
user--device--query--definitions--last_s.description: Unix timestamp for when the device was most recently detected.

user--device--query--definitions--active.title: Active Start Time
user--device--query--definitions--active.description: Unix timestamp for when the device started to be active.

user--device--query--definitions--active.title: Active End Time
user--device--query--definitions--active.description: Unix timestamp for when the device started to be inactive.

user--device--query--definitions--mac_fi.title: MAC Firewall Address
user--device--query--definitions--mac_fi.description: MAC firewall address associated with this device.

user--device--query--definitions--on_net.title: On-Net
user--device--query--definitions--on_net.description: True when the FortiClient endpoint is on-net.

user--device--query--definitions--is_for.title: FortiGuard Source
user--device--query--definitions--is_for.description: True when the device is scanned by the FortiGuard device detection service.

user--device--query--definitions--user_i.title: Device User Information
user--device--query--definitions--user_i.description: Authenticated user information retrieved by IP address.

items.title: Username
items.description: Firewall username for the user.

items.title: Common Name
items.description: Name of the user.

items.title: Mail
items.description: A mailing address for the user.

items.title: Telephone Number
items.description: A telephone number for the user.

domain name.title: Domain Names
domain name.description: LDAP server/exchange server domains the user belongs to.

items.title: Domain Name
items.description: LDAP server/exchange server domain the user belongs to.

vendor.title: Vendor
vendor.description: The name of the vendor that manufactured the product.

version-min.title: Version Minimum
version-min.description: The earliest version of the product which was affected by the vulnerability. It's vendor specific string.

version-max.title: Version Maximum
version-max.description: The latest version of the product which is affected by the vulnerability. It's vendor specific string.

firmware.title: Firmware
firmware.description: The name of the firmware used.

validity.title: Validity
validity.description: False if there is not enough information to retrieve device vulnerability.

outdated.title: Validity
outdated.description: True if the IoT information for the device is outdated.

db_date_updated.title: Database Updated
db_date_updated.description: The date of FortiGuard IoT/OT database updated in the format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.ssssss' based on RFC3339 and ISO ISO8601. If timezone offset is not given, GMT (0000) is assumed.

kev_db_date_released.title: KEV Database Released
kev_db_date_released.description: The date of FortiGuard KEV database updated in the format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.ssssss' based on RFC3339 and ISO ISO8601. If timezone offset is not given, GMT (0000) is assumed.

user--device--iot-query--definitions--re.title: Vulnerability Reference
user--device--iot-query--definitions--re.description: Reference for IoT vulnerability. The reference can be CVE-ID in the pattern of CVE-[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{4,19}, ID or url of any other reference.

user--device--iot-query--definitions--ke.title: KEV Reference
user--device--iot-query--definitions--ke.description: Reference for CISA known exploited vulnerabilities. The reference is CVE-ID in the pattern of CVE-[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{4,19}.

vendor.title: Vendor
vendor.description: The name of the vendor that manufactured the product.

version-min.title: Version Minimum
version-min.description: The earliest version of the product which was affected by the vulnerability. It's vendor specific string.

version-max.title: Version Maximum
version-max.description: The latest version of the product which is affected by the vulnerability. It's vendor specific string.

firmware.title: Firmware
firmware.description: The name of the firmware used.

validity.title: Validity
validity.description: False if there is not enough information to retrieve device vulnerability.

outdated.title: Validity
outdated.description: True if the IoT information for the device is outdated.

db_date_updated.title: Database Updated
db_date_updated.description: The date of FortiGuard IoT/OT database updated in the format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.ssssss' based on RFC3339 and ISO ISO8601. If timezone offset is not given, GMT (0000) is assumed.

kev_db_date_released.title: KEV Database Released
kev_db_date_released.description: The date of FortiGuard KEV database updated in the format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.ssssss' based on RFC3339 and ISO ISO8601. If timezone offset is not given, GMT (0000) is assumed.

severity.title: Severity
severity.description: Severity of vulnerability (0 = info, 1 = low, 2 = medium, 3 = high, 4 = critical).

type.title: Vulnerablity Type
type.description: The vulnerability class based on CWT (Common Weekness Enumeration) information.

anyOf.title: KEV References
anyOf.description: References for CISA known exploited vulnerabilities

date_added.title: Date Added
date_added.description: The date of the vulnerability added in the format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.ssssss' based on RFC3339 and ISO ISO8601. If timezone offset is not given, GMT (0000) is assumed.

date_updated.title: Date Updated
date_updated.description: The date of the vulnerability updated in the format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.ssssss' based on RFC3339 and ISO ISO8601. If timezone offset is not given, GMT (0000) is assumed.

get.summary:
List authenticated firewall proxy users.
Access Group: authgrp

items.title: Explicit Proxy User
items.description: Explicit proxy user.

id.title: Index
id.description: Index of the user in the list.

duration_secs.title: Duration
duration_secs.description: The duration of the authenticated session in seconds.

expiry_secs.title: Expiry
expiry_secs.description: The time left of the authenticated session in seconds.

traffic_vol_bytes.title: Traffic Volume
traffic_vol_bytes.description: The traffic volume from the authenticated user in bytes.

ipaddr.title: IP Address
ipaddr.description: The IP address that the authentication request is from.

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

post.summary:
Check if password adheres to local user password policy.
Access Group: authgrp

schema.title: Local User Password Policy Check
schema.description: Check if the password provided conforms to the local user password policy.

valid.title: Is Valid
valid.description: True if the password adheres to the password policy.

minimum-length.title: Minimum Length
minimum-length.description: True when the password violates the minimum length requirement.

maximum-length.title: Maximum Length
maximum-length.description: True when the password violates the maximum length requirement.

invalid-user.title: User Requirement
invalid-user.description: True when the user type is invalid.

min-change-characters.title: Unique Characters
min-change-characters.description: True when the password violates the minimum unique characters requirement.

min-upper-case-letter.title: Uppercase Letters
min-upper-case-letter.description: True when the password violates the minimum number of uppercase letters requirement.

min-lower-case-letter.title: Lowercase Letters
min-lower-case-letter.description: True when the password violates the minimum number of lowercase letters requirement.

min-number.title: Numeric Characters
min-number.description: True when the password violates the minimum number of numeric characters requirement.

min-non-alphanumeric.title: Alphanumeric Characters
min-non-alphanumeric.description: True when the password violates the minimum number of alphanumeric characters requirement.

reuse-password.title: Reused
reuse-password.description: True when the password was previously used.

post.summary:
Deauthenticate single, multiple, or all firewall users.
Access Group: authgrp

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Possible parameters to go in the body for the request.

user_type.description: User type [proxy|firewall]. Required for both proxy and firewall users.

id.description: User ID. Required for both proxy and firewall users.

ip.description: User IP address. Required for both proxy and firewall users.

ip_version.description: IP version [ip4|ip6]. Only required if user_type is firewall.

method.description: Authentication method [fsso|rsso|ntlm|firewall|wsso|fsso_citrix|sso_guest]. Only required if user_type is firewall.

all.description: Set to true to deauthenticate all users. Other parameters will be ignored.

users.description: Array of user objects to deauthenticate. Use this to deauthenticate multiple users at once. Each object should include the above properties.

get.summary:
Retrieve user devices from user device store. List all the user devices if there is no filter set.
Access Group: authgrp

items.title: Detected Device
items.description: A detected device.

avatar_source.title: Avatar Source
avatar_source.description: Source from where FortiClient gathers user information.

domain.title: Domain
domain.description: The name of the domain to which the FortiClient endpoint is connected, if applicable.

is_forticlient_unauth_user.title: FortiClient Unauthenticated User
is_forticlient_unauth_user.description: True when the source of the unauthenticated user is FortiClient.

items.title: Device Online Interface
items.description: Name of an online interface.

other_macs.title: Device Other MACs
other_macs.description: Summary of other MAC addresses on this device.

items.title: Device MAC Address Info
items.description: Information for a MAC address on the device.

purdue_level.title: Purdue Level
purdue_level.description: Device Purdue level based on the operational technology Purdue model.

quarantined_on_forticlient.title: Quarantined on FortiClient
quarantined_on_forticlient.description: True when the device is quarantined on FortiClient.

server.title: Server Type
server.description: Server type if the device is detected as a server.

unjoined_forticlient_endpoint.title: Unjoined FortiClient Endpoint
unjoined_forticlient_endpoint.description: True when the FortiClient endpoint has a record without an associated user device entry.

anyOf.title: Device User Information
anyOf.description: Authenticated user information retrieved by IP address.

vuln_count.title: All Levels Vulnerabilities Count
vuln_count.description: Total number of vulnerabilities for all levels.

vuln_count_critical.title: Critical Level Vulnerabilities Count
vuln_count_critical.description: Total number of critical level vulnerabilities.

vuln_count_high.title: High Level Vulnerabilities Count
vuln_count_high.description: Total number of high level vulnerabilities.

vuln_count_info.title: Info Level Vulnerabilities Count
vuln_count_info.description: Total number of info level vulnerabilities.

vuln_count_low.title: Low Level Vulnerabilities Count
vuln_count_low.description: Total number of low level vulnerabilities.

vuln_count_medium.title: Medium Level Vulnerabilities Count
vuln_count_medium.description: Total number of medium level vulnerabilities.

ztna_connected.title: ZTNA Connected
ztna_connected.description: True when the device is connected via ZTNA.

directly_connected.title: Directly Connected
directly_connected.description: True when the FortiClient endpoint is directly connected to this FortiGate.

vpn_connected.title: VPN Connected
vpn_connected.description: True when the FortiClient endpoint is connected through a VPN.

out_of_sync.title: Out of Sync
out_of_sync.description: True when the FortiClient endpoint record has not been updated by EMS due to errors between FortiOS and EMS.

iot_info.title: IoT/OT Applications
iot_info.description: Information of IoT/OT applications retrieved from FortiGuard.

iot_vuln_count.title: IoT/OT Vulnerabilities Count
iot_vuln_count.description: Total number of IoT/OT vulnerabilities for all levels.

iot_vuln_count_critical.title: Critical Level Vulnerabilities Count
iot_vuln_count_critical.description: Total number of critical level IoT/OT vulnerabilities.

iot_vuln_count_high.title: High Level Vulnerabilities Count
iot_vuln_count_high.description: Total number of high level IoT/OT vulnerabilities.

iot_vuln_count_info.title: Info Level Vulnerabilities Count
iot_vuln_count_info.description: Total number of unknown level IoT/OT vulnerabilities.

iot_vuln_count_low.title: Low Level Vulnerabilities Count
iot_vuln_count_low.description: Total number of low level IoT/OT vulnerabilities.

iot_vuln_count_medium.title: Medium Level Vulnerabilities Count
iot_vuln_count_medium.description: Total number of medium level IoT/OT vulnerabilities.

iot_kev_count.title: IoT/OT KEV Count
iot_kev_count.description: Total number of IoT/OT CISA Known Exploited Vulnerabilities for all levels.

total_vuln_count.title: Total Vulnerability Count
total_vuln_count.description: Total number of FortiClient vulnerabilities and IoT/OT vulnerabilities of the device.

max_vuln_level.title: Maximum Vulnerability Level
max_vuln_level.description: Maximum vulnerability level of FortiClient vulnerabilities and IoT/OT vulnerabilities of the device.

fortivoice_managed_serial.title: FortiVoice Serial
fortivoice_managed_serial.description: The serial of the FortiVoice that is managing this FortiVoice device.

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

parameters.name: timestamp_from
parameters.description: To get entries since the timestamp for unified historical query.

parameters.name: timestamp_to
parameters.description: To get entries before the timestamp for unified historical query.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: A list of filters. Type:{"type": string, "value": string, "op": string}. Op: filter operator [exact|contains|greaterThanEqualTo|lessThanEqualTo]. Default is exact.

parameters.name: query_type
parameters.description: Query type [latest|unified_latest|unified_history]. Default is latest.

parameters.name: view_type
parameters.description: View type [device|fortiswitch_client|forticlient|iot_vuln_info]. Default is device.

parameters.name: query_id
parameters.description: Provide a query ID to continue getting data for that unified request. Only available for unified query types.

parameters.name: cache_query
parameters.description: Cache query result for 5 mins and return query ID. Only available for unified query types. Default is false.

parameters.name: key_only
parameters.description: Return primary key fields only. Default is false.

parameters.name: filter_logic
parameters.description: The logic between filters [and|or]). Default is and.

parameters.name: total_only
parameters.description: Whether the query should return just the total number of devices present.

get.summary:

schema.title: Detected Device Statistics
schema.description: A list of seen value and count pair by given statistics item name.

items.title: Statistics Entry
items.description: A seen value and count pair of the statistics item.

chart-value.title: Chart Value
chart-value.description: A plain value of the statistics item.

chart-count.title: Chart Count
chart-count.description: Number of occurrences of the value.

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

parameters.name: stat-query-type
parameters.description: Stat query type [device|fortiswitch_client|forticlient]. Default is device.

parameters.name: stat-key
parameters.description: key of the stats count on [os_name|hardware_type|detected_interface|is_online|max_vuln_level|fortiswitch_id|fortiswitch_port_name]. fortiswitch_id and fortiswitch_port_name only for fortiswitch_client stats query type

parameters.name: timestamp_from
parameters.description: To get entries since the timestamp for stats query.

parameters.name: timestamp_to
parameters.description: To get entries before the timestamp for stats query.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: A list of filters. Type:{"type": string, "value": string, "op": string}. Only is_online type is supported. Op: filter operator [exact|contains]. Default is exact.

parameters.name: filter_logic
parameters.description: The logic between filters [and|or]). Default is and.

post.summary:
Test the connectivity of the given RADIUS server and, optionally, the validity of a username & password.

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Possible parameters to go in the body for the request.

mkey.description: Name of FortiGate's RADIUS object whose settings to test.

ordinal.description: If 'mkey' is provided, the server-secret pair to use from the object: 'primary', 'secondary' or 'tertiary'. Defaults to 'primary'.

server.description: Host name or IP of a RADIUS server. If 'mkey' is provided, this overrides the 'server' value in the object.

secret.description: Secret password for the RADIUS server. If 'mkey' is provided, this overrides the 'secret' value in the object.

auth_type.description: Authentication protocol to use [auto|ms_chap_v2|ms_chap|chap|pap]. If 'mkey' is provided, this overrides the 'auth-type' value in the object.

user.description: User name whose access to check.

get.summary:
Query user info.
Access Group: authgrp

schema.title: User Info Query
schema.description: Retrieve user info that matches the given filter.

total.title: Total
total.description: Total number of user info entries that match the filter.

count.title: Count
count.description: Number of user info entries returned.

items.title: User Info Entry
items.description: User info entry. A map of attribute name to array of values.

cn.title: Common Name
cn.description: The name that represents an object.

items.title: Name
items.description: The name of the object.

givenName.title: Given Name
givenName.description: The given name (first name) of the user.

items.title: Name
items.description: The given name (first name) of the user.

sn.title: Surname
sn.description: The family or last name of the user.

items.title: Surname
items.description: Last name of the user.

userPrincipalName.title: User Principal Names
userPrincipalName.description: User Principal Names (UPNs) that are an Internet-style login name for a user based on the Internet standard RFC 822.

items.title: User Principal Name
items.description: Login name for the user.

items.title: Telephone Number
items.description: A telephone number for the user.

mail.title: Mail
mail.description: A list of email addresses for a contact.

items.title: Email Address
items.description: An email address for the user.

items.title: Company Name
items.description: A company name for the user.

department.title: Department
department.description: The department in which the user works.

items.title: Department
items.description: The department in which the user works.

distinguishedName.title: Distinguished Name
distinguishedName.description: The distinguished name of the user.

items.title: Distinguished Name
items.description: The distinguished name of the user.

memberOf.title: Member Of
memberOf.description: The distinguished name of the groups to which this object belongs.

items.title: Member Of
items.description: The distinguished name of a group to which the user belongs.

items.title: Title
items.description: A job title for the user.

manager.title: Manager
manager.description: The distinguished name of the user who is the user's manager.

items.title: Manager
items.description: The distinguished name of the user who is the user's manager.

items.title: Street Address
items.description: One street address for the user.

postOfficeBox.title: Post Office Box
postOfficeBox.description: The post office box number for this object.

items.title: Post Office Box
items.description: A post office box number for the user.

l.title: Locality Name
l.description: The name of a locality, such as a town or city.

items.title: Locality Name
items.description: A locality for this object.

st.title: State
st.description: The name of a user's state or province.

items.title: State
items.description: A state or province that the user lives in.

postalCode.title: Postal Code
postalCode.description: The postal or zip code for mail delivery.

items.title: Postal Code
items.description: A postal or zip code for mail delivery.

co.title: Country
co.description: The country/region in which the user is located.

items.title: Country
items.description: A country or region in which the user is located.

accountExpires.title: Account Expires
accountExpires.description: The date when the account expires. This value represents the number of 100-nanosecond intervals since January 1, 1601 (UTC).

items.title: Account Expires
items.description: Date when the user's account expires.

items.title: Username
items.description: Firewall username for the user.

items.title: Source IP
items.description: Source IP address of the user's account.

items.title: Server
items.description: Server name that the user's account is from.

items.title: VDOM
items.description: VDOM of the interface that the user is connected to.

domain name.title: Domain Names
domain name.description: LDAP server/exchange server domains the user belongs to.

items.title: Domain Name
items.description: LDAP server/exchange server domain the user belongs to.

logon time.title: Logon Times
logon time.description: Timestamps for the most recent user log ons allowed by FortiGate firewall policy.

items.title: Logon Time
items.description: Timestamp of the most recent user log on allowed by FortiGate firewall policy.

logoff time.title: Logoff Times
logoff time.description: Timestamps for the most recent user log offs allowed by FortiGate firewall policy.

items.title: Logoff Time
items.description: Timestamp of the most recent user log off allowed by FortiGate firewall policy.

source.title: Sources
source.description: Sources from where user information is collected.

items.title: Source
items.description: Source from where user information is collected.

thumbnailPhoto.title: Thumbnail Photos
thumbnailPhoto.description: File paths for user thumbnail photos.

items.title: Thumbnail Photo
items.description: The file path of the user thumbnail photo.

items.title: Detected Device
items.description: Device information.

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

parameters.name: timestamp_from
parameters.description: To get entries since the timestamp for unified historical query.

parameters.name: timestamp_to
parameters.description: To get entries before the timestamp for unified historical query.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: A list of filters. Type:{"type": string, "value": string, "op": string}. Op: filter operator [exact|contains|greaterThanEqualTo|lessThanEqualTo]. Default is exact.

parameters.name: query_type
parameters.description: Query type [latest|unified_latest|unified_history]. Default is latest.

parameters.name: query_id
parameters.description: Provide a query ID to continue getting data for that unified request. Only available for unified query types.

parameters.name: cache_query
parameters.description: Cache query result for 5 mins and return query ID. Only available for unified query types. Default is false.

parameters.name: key_only
parameters.description: Return primary key fields only. Default is false.

parameters.name: filter_logic
parameters.description: The logic between filters [and|or]). Default is and.

parameters.name: total_only
parameters.description: Whether the query should return just the total number of identities present.

get.summary:

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: A list of filters. Type:{"type": string, "value": string}

get.summary:
Get SCIM client users.
Access Group: authgrp

schema.title: User SCIM User Names
schema.description: User names for a given SCIM client.

items.title: SCIM User
items.description: SCIM client remote user.

displayName.title: Display Name
displayName.description: The display name of the user.

formatted.title: Full Name
formatted.description: The full name of the user.

active.title: Active
active.description: Indicates whether the user is active, 1 for active and 0 for inactive.

created.title: Created Timestamp
created.description: The timestamp when the user was created.

lastModified.title: Last Modified Timestamp
lastModified.description: The timestamp when the user's information was last modified.

items.title: Email
items.description: Email details.

primary.title: Primary Email
primary.description: True when the email is the user's primary email.

value.title: Email Address
value.description: The email address of the user.

groups.title: Groups
groups.description: A list of groups that the user belongs to.

items.title: Group
items.description: The display name of a group the user is a member of.

parameters.name: client_name
parameters.description: SCIM client name to be used to retrieve group names.

parameters.name: group_name
parameters.description: SCIM client group name to be used to retrieve users, if left empty, will retrieve users from all groups.

parameters.name: user_name
parameters.description: SCIM client user name to retrieve, if left empty, will retrieve all users from group.
